Abilities.name: Defy
Abilities.description: Stand strong in the face of a higher authority or insurmountable odds.

Abilities.name: Stealth
Abilities.description: Skirt the edges of danger or avoid notice.

Abilities.name: Survey
Abilities.description: Watch your environment and notice details others may miss.

Abilities.name: Sway
Abilities.description: Convince or manipulate someone into doing what you want.

Skills.name: Acrobatics
Skills.description: Traverse your surroundings with grace and speed.

Skills.name: Analyze
Skills.description: Examine something to understand its function or purpose.

Skills.name: Ambush
Skills.description: Exploit surprise for frightful or violent ends.

Skills.name: Authority
Skills.description: Let your position of power do the talking.

Skills.name: Assess
Skills.description: Think before acting. Catalog the possible advantages and consequences of a course of action.

Skills.name: Backsnap
Skills.description: Overwhelming aggression

Skills.name: Berate
Skills.description: Use your words to make someone feel small

Skills.name: Bleedout
Skills.description: Small, precise strikes in vital regions

Skills.name: Brawl
Skills.description: Engage in unstructured close combat.

Skills.name: Candor
Skills.description: Get someone to view you favorably or reveal a secret.

Skills.name: Challenge
Skills.description: Confront someone in a way that demands a response.

Skills.name: Cobble
Skills.description: Rapidly make an improvised tool or weapon from available tech.

Skills.name: Comfort
Skills.description: Provide emotional support to someone in need

Skills.name: Command
Skills.description: Wield authority to get things done

Skills.name: Connect
Skills.description: Open up to someone so that they reciprocate

Skills.name: Consort
Skills.description: Meet with others to gain information or favors.

Skills.name: Coordinate
Skills.description: Direct multiple unique entities to act as one.

Skills.name: Crowdbreaking
Skills.description: Maximize damage to groups of surrounding foes

Skills.name: Deal
Skills.description: Negotiate a mutually beneficial agreement with someone.

Skills.name: Drama
Skills.description: Appeal to emotions to elicit a response.

Skills.name: Eavesdrop
Skills.description: Listen in on a conversation without being noticed.

Skills.name: Encourage
Skills.description: Aid someone to feel confident in their own strengths

Skills.name: Frighten
Skills.description: Use fear as a blunt instrument.

Skills.name: Galvanize
Skills.description: Stoke positive energy; inspire confidence in yourself and others.

Skills.name: Hide
Skills.description: Conceal yourself or something else from view.

Skills.name: Ignite
Skills.description: Incite action from an individual or group on the brink of conflict.

Skills.name: Impersonate
Skills.description: Pass yourself off as someone who you aren't.

Skills.name: Initiate
Skills.description: Start something dangerous or take the first step into the unknown

Skills.name: Inspire
Skills.description: Motivate others to take action

Skills.name: Interface
Skills.description: Work with tech the way it was intended to accomplish a task.

Skills.name: Lift
Skills.description: Take something from someone without them noticing.

Skills.name: Logic
Skills.description: Analyze something to understand where its axioms lead

Skills.name: Loyalty
Skills.description: Use your commitment to something as a source of strength.

Skills.name: Lurk
Skills.description: Remain unnoticed while observing your surroundings.

Skills.name: Manipulate
Skills.description: Deceive or coerce someone into doing what you want.

Skills.name: Mirado
Skills.description: Observe, then act.

Skills.name: Navigate
Skills.description: Find your way through complex environments.

Skills.name: Persuade
Skills.description: Convince someone to do something without misleading them.

Skills.name: Obfuscate
Skills.description: Hide your true intentions or confound someone's understanding.

Skills.name: Observe
Skills.description: Watch and learn. Gain insight into a person or situation.

Skills.name: Organize
Skills.description: Arrange meetings, get people on the same page, or create understanding from chaos.

Skills.name: Pull
Skills.description: Move something heavy or difficult.

Skills.name: Pretense
Skills.description: Present a false front or disguise your true intentions.

Skills.name: Rally
Skills.description: Inspire others to come together and act as one.

Skills.name: Read
Skills.description: Understand the emotions of others

Skills.name: Relate
Skills.description: Establish a connection or understanding with someone.

Skills.name: Rhetoric
Skills.description: Persuade or manipulate others with the way your words make them feel

Skills.name: Rummage
Skills.description: Search through refuse for something useful.

Skills.name: Sabotage
Skills.description: Tamper with or damage a machine or device.

Skills.name: Scheme
Skills.description: Make a complicated plan to do something underhanded or immoral

Skills.name: Smash
Skills.description: Hurt someone or damage something with brute force.

Skills.name: Spin
Skills.description: Twist the truth or redirect conversation to your advantage.

Skills.name: Stalk
Skills.description: Follow someone or something without being noticed.

Skills.name: Step
Skills.description: Move carefully through dangerous terrain.

Skills.name: Stubborn
Skills.description: Resist change or pressure

Skills.name: Study
Skills.description: Research a topic or item. Gain insight into its function or history.

Skills.name: Suggest
Skills.description: Plant an idea in someone's mind without them realizing it.

Skills.name: Tinker
Skills.description: Work to understand or improve a machine or device

Skills.name: Throatgore
Skills.description: Pack tactics, go for the throat
